metas.name: Sid the Science Kid
metas.description: Features a curious young boy exploring scientific concepts through hands-on activities, similar to Ada Twist, Scientist.

metas.name: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
metas.description: Focuses on social-emotional learning and everyday life lessons for preschoolers, echoing the gentle lessons of Doc McStuffins and Bluey.

metas.name: Wild Kratts
metas.description: Combines animation and live-action to teach children about animals and their habitats, a great follow-up to the educational aspects of The Magic School Bus.

metas.name: Tumble Leaf
metas.description: A gentle, beautifully animated series that encourages exploration and problem-solving through a curious fox, similar in tone to Curious George.

metas.name: Sarah & Duck
metas.description: A charming and whimsical show about a young girl and her duck, exploring imaginative adventures and everyday wonders, fitting with the playful spirit of Bluey.

metas.name: Octonauts
metas.description: An animated series where a team of aquatic explorers go on underwater missions, blending adventure with marine biology education, akin to the educational focus of The Magic School Bus and WordGirl.

metas.name: Sarah & Duck
metas.description: A charming and whimsical show about a young girl and her duck, exploring imaginative adventures and everyday wonders, fitting with the playful spirit of Bluey.

metas.name: Ask the StoryBots
metas.description: An animated educational show that answers kids' questions about the world in a fun and musical way, aligning with the curiosity of Peg + Cat and Numberblocks.

metas.name: Super Why!
metas.description: Uses literacy skills to solve problems, encouraging reading and comprehension in an adventure format, similar to WordGirl's focus on language.

metas.name: Paw Patrol
metas.description: Follows a team of rescue dogs who help their community, offering problem-solving and teamwork lessons in an engaging animated format.

metas.name: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!
metas.description: Explores various scientific and natural world topics through adventures with the Cat in the Hat, similar to The Magic School Bus's educational approach.

metas.name: Chuggington
metas.description: Features young trains learning about their world, focusing on teamwork, problem-solving, and the importance of helping others.

metas.name: Bubble Guppies
metas.description: An energetic and musical animated show that teaches about various topics, from science to history, through the adventures of underwater preschoolers.

metas.name: Puffin Rock
metas.description: A beautifully animated series about two young puffins exploring their island home, emphasizing nature and family bonds.

metas.name: Tayo the Little Bus
metas.description: Follows the adventures of a young bus and his friends, teaching about city life, friendship, and responsibility.

metas.name: Hey Duggee
metas.description: A delightful and gentle series where children earn badges by completing tasks and learning new things, with a focus on fun and exploration.

metas.name: Blippi
metas.description: A live-action educational show where a friendly host explores various places and teaches children about the world around them.

metas.name: Go, Diego, Go!
metas.description: An adventure series where a young explorer helps animals in need, promoting problem-solving and environmental awareness, similar to Special Agent Oso's mission-based structure.

metas.name: Olaf Presents
metas.description: A series of short animated specials where Olaf retells classic Disney stories in his unique and humorous way, offering lighthearted entertainment.

metas.name: Dinosaur Train
metas.description: A show that combines animation with puppetry to teach children about dinosaurs and paleontology through exciting time-traveling adventures.

metas.name: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse
metas.description: An interactive animated series that encourages problem-solving and early math skills through the adventures of Mickey Mouse and his friends.

metas.name: The Wiggles
metas.description: A long-running live-action children's music program that encourages singing, dancing, and learning through fun songs and activities.

metas.name: Little Bear
metas.description: A gentle and heartwarming animated series about a young bear and his animal friends, focusing on family, imagination, and childhood experiences.

metas.name: Rusty Rivets
metas.description: An animated series where a young inventor and his friends use their creativity and engineering skills to solve problems and build amazing contraptions.

metas.name: Ready Jet Go!
metas.description: An animated series that blends science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) concepts with fun space adventures.

metas.name: Xavier Riddle and the Secret Museum
metas.description: Follows a young boy who travels back in time to meet historical figures and learn about their lives, offering educational insights in an engaging format.

metas.name: If You Give a Mouse a Cookie
metas.description: An animated series based on the popular children's book, exploring cause-and-effect and imaginative scenarios.

metas.name: Molly of Denali
metas.description: Features an Alaska Native girl who uses technology to connect with her community and learn about her culture and the world.

metas.name: Sesame Street
metas.description: A classic educational program that teaches preschoolers foundational skills in literacy, math, and social-emotional development.

metas.name: Alma's Way
metas.description: Follows a young Bronx girl who learns to navigate life's challenges with the help of her family and community, emphasizing cultural heritage and problem-solving.

metas.name: Esme & Roy
metas.description: A gentle animated series about two young monster-sitters who help their young charges overcome everyday challenges, focusing on emotional intelligence and problem-solving.

metas.name: Do, Re & Mi
metas.description: A musical animated series that teaches children about music theory and appreciation through fun songs and adventures.

metas.name: Rhyme Time Town
metas.description: An animated series that uses rhymes and songs to help preschoolers learn about language and problem-solving.

metas.name: Waffles + Mochi
metas.description: A live-action and animated show where two best friends travel the world to learn about different foods and cultures, encouraging curiosity and healthy eating.

metas.name: Trash Truck
metas.description: A sweet and simple animated series about the friendship between a boy and his trash truck, exploring themes of nature and imagination.

metas.name: The InBESTigators
metas.description: A live-action comedy series about four clever kids who solve mysteries in their school and neighborhood, similar to the problem-solving in WordGirl but with live actors.
